item.description:
Last weekend, we had our second photowalk in Plymouth, MA and it was a great success.  Lovely weather, combined with lots of interesting photo opportunities along the waterfront, made for a wonderful day.


Saturday, July 16th at 3PM, we'll meet at 11 Dorrance Street in Providence, outside McCormick & Schmick’s restaurant.  This puts us in the downtown area, and within easy walking distance of College Hill.  We will have many opportunities to photograph wonderful architecture and hopefully we’ll have some models to make it even more interesting!  WaterFire is supposed to ignite just after 8:15PM.  It has been suggested that bringing tripods to mount your cameras on, would be a useful to have.


As was the case on previous photowalks, models will have to come dressed with hair and make-up the way they want to be photographed. Unlike Mike & Pat's Great Model Shoots, we won't have those resources available to us.  There is paid parking in the area.

There is no charge for this photowalk. However, we will more than likely find someplace to sit and have a meal together like we did last time, so there is the cost of dinner.  I also strongly recommend wearing comfy walking shoes worthy of pounding the pavement in search of the perfect photograph. 

 

It is important to RSVP for this event.  We may have an opportunity to get some unique shots, but it will depend on the number in attendance.


If you have any questions, feel free to post them here, or send me a message. Also, please feel free to pass along this information to anyone you think might enjoy a fun day of photography & friendship.
item.name: Photowalk of Providence, including WaterFire
